title: How to secure follow-on investment for your startup (FounderU) + Ask an Angel with Zach Coelius | E1264
description: Jason discusses how founders can secure follow on funding (1:57), then is joined by investor Zach Coelius to answer listener questions on technical co-founders (38:21), successful founder traits (40:41), founder red flags (46:07), why startups fail diligence (56:17) and more.
